member.name: P:SliderControl.NumberSlider.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value that the slider can be.

member.name: P:SliderControl.NumberSlider.MinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value that the slider can be.

member.name: P:SliderControl.NumberSlider.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current value of the slider.

member.name: P:SliderControl.NumberSlider.SliderTabStop
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the slider bar can receive tab focus.

member.name: P:SliderControl.NumberSlider.ShowTicks
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to show ticks under the slider.

member.name: M:SliderControl.NumberSlider.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new number slider with a maximum value of 10.

member.name: M:SliderControl.NumberSlider.ValidateInput(System.String)
member.summary: Convert an input string to a valid value.
member.returns: The integer created from the string if it is numeric. If not numeric, the current value of the control is returned. If the string is numeric but the value is out of bounds, the maximum value is returned.

member.name: M:SliderControl.NumberSlider.ValidateInput(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert an input integer to a valid integer by verifying that it is within bounds.
member.returns: a valid integer confined to [MinimumValue, MaximumValue]
